name: todo-backend
description: Backend for a simple todo application

scripts.start: npm run prismix && NODE_ENV=production node src/server.js
scripts.prismix: npx prismix && prisma format && npx prisma generate
scripts.migrate: npm run prismix && npx prisma migrate dev --name initial_migration
scripts.migrate:db-push: npm run prismix && npx prisma db push --preview-feature
scripts.test: dotenv -e .env.test npm run migrate && npm run testdb:seed && dotenv -e .env.test jest --config=jest.config.js

author: Akalanka Perera
